vclaim: U.S. Rep. Matt Gaetz, R-Florida, stated, "We better use" the Second Amendment when railing against alleged suppression of speech by social media platforms.
title: Did Matt Gaetz Say ‘We Better Use’ the 2nd Amendment When Discussing Social Media Companies?
subtitle: It's not the first time Gaetz has used such incendiary language.
author: Bethania Palma
